meaningMnemonic: The <radical>sun</radical> has an <radical>excuse</radical> for disappearing at <kanji>night</kanji>. The sun gets really tired, same as anyone else – so when night rolls around the sun excuses itself and goes to sleep. It’s a valid excuse.
readingMnemonic: Unfortunately, you also have a history of overworking yourself, so you've been outright <reading>ban</reading>ned (ばん) from showing up at <kanji>night</kanji>.
